Prices have soared, mortgages bills have risen and taxes are at a seventy year high.

Delivering economic stability will be Labour’s foundation for growth.

Our plan to get Britain building means unlocking wasted potential to deliver new homes.

Labour will build the next generation of New Towns.

It’s an essential part of our plan to tackle the housing crisis - with homes fit for the future.

Change is coming — change you can believe in, change you can vote for.

Kei Starmer’s Labour will bring the change our country needs.

Great to be in Aldershot today with our excellent candidate @Ms_Alex_Baker, Councillor @RushmoorGareth, and residents launching Labour’s ‘First Steps’ for government.

@Keir_Starmer's first steps are part of our long-term plan to get Britain back on its feet.

Susannah used to vote Conservative because she felt Labour lost its way.

Now she’s putting her trust in my changed Labour Party. 

I’m ready to roll up my sleeves and deliver for people like Susannah, with six first steps to get Britain’s future back.
Step six of Labour's first steps: Recruit 6,500 new teachers in key subjects to prepare children for life, work and the future, paid for by ending tax breaks for private schools.

Step five of Labour's first steps: Crack down on antisocial behaviour, with more neighbourhood police paid for by ending wasteful contracts, tough new penalties for offenders, and a new network of youth hubs.

Step four of Labour's first steps: Set up Great British Energy, a publicly-owned clean power company, to cut bills for good and boost energy security, paid for by a windfall tax on oil and gas giants.

Six first steps for change. 
 
1. Deliver economic stability. 
2. Cut NHS waiting times. 
3. Launch a new Border Security Command. 
4. Set up Great British Energy. 
5. Crack down on antisocial behaviour.
6. Recruit 6,500 new teachers. 
 
Fully funded and ready to go.
Step two of Labour's first steps: Cut NHS waiting times with 40,000 more appointments each week, during evenings and weekends, paid for by cracking down on tax avoidance and non-dom loopholes.
Step three of Labour's first steps: Launch a new Border Security Command with hundreds of new specialist investigators and use counter-terror powers to smash the criminal boat gangs.
Step one of Labour's first steps: Economic stability with tough spending rules, so we can grow our economy and keep taxes, inflation and mortgages as low as possible.

Six first steps.
 
No gimmicks. No sticking plasters.
 
My changed Labour Party has a plan for a decade of national renewal.

Labour’s got a plan to get Britain back on its feet.

Our first steps will set us on the path to national renewal. It’s time for change. 🌹

I’m ready to step up and change Britain.

This is how.

After 14 years of Tory rule, @Keir_Starmer is ready to deliver a decade of national renewal.

He has the positive vision Britain needs, and these are his first steps for change.
What are the first steps @Keir_Starmer’s Labour government would take?
Today at 10am we're launching our first steps for change. Let's get Britain's future back.

Today the Labour Party sends a heartfelt thank you to the nurses who work tirelessly to care for those in need.

Only Labour has a plan to get the NHS back on its feet.

It’s International Nurses’ Day.

As a cancer survivor, I feel deep, heartfelt gratitude to the nurses that were part of the team that saved my life. 

Every family has a similar story of thanks for the love and care you give when we need you most.

Thank you 💙

On International Nurses Day, I want to say thank you to our nurses who work so hard to care for those in need.
 
Today I'm thinking of my mum, too. She worked as a nurse in our NHS, then NHS nurses cared for her when she was ill.
 
Labour will get our NHS back on its feet.

text:
Fantastic to be here in Wales today with Vaughan, Ed and Jo as we set out our plan for GB Energy - clean homegrown power that will turbocharge jobs and growth across Britain.

Labour will take back control of our national energy security.
My Labour government will work with @vaughangething to bring good jobs, lower bills and energy security to Wales and the rest of the UK with our plan to introduce floating offshore wind.

Lower bills, good jobs and energy independence from tyrants like Putin. 

That's what Labour's GB Energy will deliver across the UK.

bbc.co.uk/news/business-6865…
Only Labour has a long-term plan for good jobs, lower bills and energy security for your family and for Britain.

Fourteen years of the Tories has left us exposed, with no plan to deliver secure, clean energy.

The next @UKLabour government will switch on GB Energy, creating skilled jobs, cutting your bills and delivering energy security.
Happy Holi to everyone celebrating in the UK and around the world!

After 14 years in office, 12 failed economic plans, 7 Chancellors and 5 Prime Ministers, the Conservatives cannot deliver the change our country needs.

Only Labour has a plan to get our economy growing and give Britain its future back.

The choice at the next election is clear:

A £46bn unfunded commitment that could crash the economy again from the Conservatives.

A serious plan for economic growth, with stability, investment and reform to make work pay, from Labour.

#VoteLabour to give Britain its future back
